name: .PPKG
summary: Learn about .PPKG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can apply the settings a PPKG file contains by either:
Opening Windows Settings and selecting Accounts → Access work or school → Add or remove a provisioning package → Add a package, then adding your PPKG file
Windows will then ask you to confirm you want to add the provisioning package your PPKG file contains. Note that you must have administrator-level privileges to use a PPKG file.
